author: Xbox
description:
From former Skyrim developer Nate Purkeypile comes The Axis Unseen — a heavy-metal open-world horror hunting game where primal nature and ancient myths collide.

https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9nq374hdgzpf

Step into a world older than humanity itself. Hunt monsters born from forgotten folklore. Track them through wind, blood, and sound — but remember, they can hunt you too.

• Forge arrows from the elements.• Use your senses to track supernatural beasts.• Survive in a vast open world of fire, mist, and mystery.• Original soundtrack by Clifford Meyer (ISIS, Red Sparowes, Windmills by the Ocean).• Fully optimized for Xbox Series X|S with high-performance visuals and immersive controller feedback.

The hunt begins on Xbox Series X|S — DECEMBER 18th 2025.

author: Xbox
description:
FREE UPDATE OUT NOW ON XBOX!

Bringing you bleeding edge visuals (circa 1998) Retro mode brings the same combat, the same oppressive deep sea horror, but reborn in glorious low resolution. Retro mode combines some adjusted visual presentation and filter techniques to bring back the 'sat in front of the tv cross legged at midnight' nostalgia, and if we do say so ourselves... really adds a distinct charm to our nightmare filled research stations. 

Beneath is a Lovecraft-inspired survival FPS built by two brothers. Scarce ammo, merciless enemies and a sense of the unknown combine in a 10+ hour, story-driven single player campaign, built for both veteran gamers and those seeking an old school experience.

Seasoned diver Noah Quinn’s routine expedition plunges him into chaos, trapping him in the depths of the ocean, where an ancient evil lurks. As supplies dwindle and nightmarish creatures close in, Noah must confront horrifying mutations and unravel a sinister conspiracy that threatens h
title: Beneath | Retro Mode Launch Trailer |

author: Xbox
description:
The dead are rising in Georgia in a new tale of survival featuring Rick, Daryl, Michonne, and Negan from AMC's The Walking Dead in an epic crossover DLC for World War Z!

Take a stand for humanity in January 2026!
https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9MT29M7W781R
